string.value: Have you heard about #bCupid's Lost Arrows#k? You can find out more from #rCassandra.#k
Please bring me #b50 Cupid's Lost Arrows.#k You can get them from any monster. I will give you an awesome Valentines present when you bring them to me!
You can repeat this quest every 2 hours until #rFebruary 17th 2010.#k However, you'll only be able to receive the Cupid Wings Cape once. After that, you'll just receive additional #bEXP.#k
Valentine's Day is here and everyone is in love! Oh? You disagree? Hehe. That reminds me, have you heard the story about #bCupid's Lost Arrows#k?

They say anyone hit by Cupid's Arrow falls in love. But monsters have started stealing the arrows because they're jealous, which means there will be fewer people in love this year! We have to get the arrows back!

If you bring me #b50 Cupid's Lost Arrows,#k I'll reward you with a #rCupid Wings Cape#k that's good for #b30 days#k, and if you already have a Cupid Wings Cape, I'll give you #bEXP.#k Hurry, you don't have much time!
You've really become much cold-hearted. This will only be available until #rFebruary 17th 2010,#k so don't hesitate too long!
